title: List GitHub releases — gh_releases
text: Get list GitHub releases using gh::gh().

title: List GitHub releases — gh_releases
text: repo name repository. owner account owner repository. .limit Number records return. can used instead manual pagination. default NULL, means defaults GitHub API used. can set number request (less) records, also Inf request records. Note, request many records, multiple GitHub API calls used get , can take potentially long time.

title: List GitHub releases — gh_releases
text: data.frame containing releases repository.

title: List GitHub releases — gh_releases
text: Returns gh_releases()$time UTC, set created_at drafts, published_at others.

what: Git logs for John Benninghoff's GitHub and private R repositories. — gitlogs
title: Git logs for John Benninghoff's GitHub and private R repositories. — gitlogs
text: Git commit logs jabenninghoff's public GitHub R Repositories (jbplot, rdev, rtraining, siracon2022, workshop7) private git repositories (rstudio-training, software-resilience) inception (September 8, 2020) April 30, 2022, retrieved using gert::git_log().

title: Git logs for John Benninghoff's GitHub and private R repositories. — gitlogs
Git logs for John Benninghoff's GitHub and private R repositories. — gitlogs
text: data frame 1461 rows 7 variables: repo GitHub git repository name commit SHA-1 hash author author's name email time POSIXct date-time commit local time zone (America/Chicago) files number files commit merge TRUE merge commit message commit message

title: Git logs for John Benninghoff's GitHub and private R repositories. — gitlogs
text: GitHub, https://github.com/jabenninghoff?tab=repositories&q=&type=source&language=r&sort=, John's private git server.

title: Render timeline visualization — render_timevis
text: Create timeline visualization using timevis::timevis() save using htmlwidgets::saveWidget().

title: Render timeline visualization — render_timevis
text: data dataframe containing timeline items. item timeline represented row dataframe. start content two required columns. See Data format section details. full list supported columns, see Data Format section official visjs Timeline documentation. groups dataframe containing groups data (optional). See Groups section details. file File save HTML showZoom TRUE (default), include "Zoom "/"Zoom " buttons widget.

title: Render timeline visualization — render_timevis
text: timeline visualization htmlwidgets object.

title: Render timeline visualization — render_timevis
text: render_timevis() saves widget fixed width (1400, approximate width laptop screen) returns htmlwidgets object without specified width.
